name: Summer Beach Ball Champion: Tap to Bounce, Avoid the Spikes!
name_original: Summer Beach Ball Champion: Tap to Bounce, Avoid the Spikes!
description:
Summer Beach Ball Champion is a simple beach ball bounce game, easy to play that it will actually be simple to keep the colorful summer ball in the air but looks can be deceiving. Keeping it the air avoiding spikes for an extremely high score will prove more challenging than you think.

Think you have what it takes to get to the top? Play now!

How to play Summer Beach Ball Champion:
-Tap to bounce the ball before the spikes. 
-Don't touch the spikes!
